body:
Hi,

Georg Mischler wrote:
Depends what you're looking for - help/FAQ/trouble-shooting , nice
examples of what people achieved, references to companies offering
Radiance support or consulting ?

...

for the moment "wiki" is not top on my nice-to-have list at
radiance-online.org, although the ability for others to contribute to
some sort of knowledge base via a web frontend is.

(crossport to Desktop Radiance as the question origined there)

regards
Peter (radiance-online admin)
